metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Internet Explorer Retirement
Microsoft ended all support for Internet Explorer June 15, 2022.
Internet Explorer Retirement Dates:
Source ...
content.html: Source ...

content.text: Earlier Announcements
Windows 11 Removes Internet Explorer
Internet Explorer is disabled in Windows 11
content.html: Internet Explorer is disabled in Windows 11

content.text: Windows 10 Replaces Internet Explorer
Internet Explorer is "replaced" by Edge in Windows 10
content.html: Internet Explorer is "replaced" by Edge in Windows 10

content.text: Internet Explorer Retires
IE 11 goes out of support on June 15 2022
content.html: IE 11 goes out of support on June 15 2022

content.text: Microsoft Edge Legacy
Edge was the default browser for Windows 10.
content.html: Edge was the default browser for Windows 10.

content.text: It was built with Microsoft's browser engine EdgeHTML and their Chakra JavaScript engine.
content.html: It was built with Microsoft's browser engine EdgeHTML and their Chakra JavaScript engine.

content.text: The first versions of Edge (12-18), are now referred to as " Edge Legacy ".
content.html: The first versions of Edge (12-18), are now referred to as "Edge Legacy".

content.text: The Microsoft support for Edge Legacy ended on March 9, 2021.
content.html: The Microsoft support for Edge Legacy ended on March 9, 2021.

content.text: Future Windows updates will replace Edge Legacy with The New Edge .
content.html: Future Windows updates will replace Edge Legacy with The New Edge.

content.text: Retirement dates published August 17, 2020:
Source ...
content.html: Source ...

content.text: The New Edge
The new Microsoft Edge is Chromium based with Blink and V8 engines.
content.html: The new Microsoft Edge is Chromium based with Blink and V8 engines.

content.text: It was released in January 2020, and is available for Windows 7, 8, and 10.
content.html: It was released in January 2020, and is available for Windows 7, 8, and 10.

content.text: It can also be downloaded for macOS, iOS, and Android.
content.html: It can also be downloaded for macOS, iOS, and Android.

content.text: The new Edge follows the Modern Lifecycle Policy (updates on an approx. six-week cycle).
content.html: The new Edge follows the Modern Lifecycle Policy (updates on an approx. six-week cycle).

content.text: Google
Google Ad Manager
As of March 28, 2022, Google Ad Manager no longer supports ad serving for Internet Explorer versions 11 and below.
content.html: As of March 28, 2022, Google Ad Manager no longer supports ad serving for Internet Explorer versions 11 and below.

content.text: Source ...
content.html: Source ...

content.text: Google Search
As of October 1, 2021, Google Search no longer supports Internet Explorer 11.
content.html: As of October 1, 2021, Google Search no longer supports Internet Explorer 11.

content.text: Source ...
content.html: Source ...

content.text: Google Workspace
As of March 15, 2021, Google Workspace no longer supports Internet Explorer 11.
content.html: As of March 15, 2021, Google Workspace no longer supports Internet Explorer 11.

content.text: Source ...
content.html: Source ...

content.text: Old Operating Systems
Internet Explorer 11 is still a component in some old Windows operating system and follows the Lifecycle Policy for these products:
content.html: Internet Explorer 11 is still a component in some old Windows operating system and follows the Lifecycle Policy for these products:

content.text: Old Applications
Some old PCs (like in public libraries) are still using Internet Explorer.
content.html: Some old PCs (like in public libraries) are still using Internet Explorer.

content.text: Some legacy web applications are using Internet Explorer.
content.html: Some legacy web applications are using Internet Explorer.

content.text: Some legacy web applications are using Internet Explorer runtime DLLs.
content.html: Some legacy web applications are using Internet Explorer runtime DLLs.

content.text: Some AJAX based applications are using Microsoft ActiveX components.
content.html: Some AJAX based applications are using Microsoft ActiveX components.

content.text: In order to ease the migration from Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge offers Internet Explorer Mode , providing backward compatibility and enabling customers to continue to run legacy web applications.
content.html: In order to ease the migration from Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge offers Internet Explorer Mode, providing backward compatibility and enabling customers to continue to run legacy web applications.
